summary: A test suite that verifies the PadDynamicalDecoupling transpiler pass, checking that appropriate dynamical decoupling sequences are inserted, that gate calibrations and target constraints are respected, and that circuit behavior remains correct across diverse scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of quantum circuit compilation by automatically adding dynamical decoupling pulses to reduce decoherence, thereby improving execution fidelity on quantum hardware.
